DOC.brief_summary: In this study the effects of mineralocorticoid stimulation on social cognition will be investigated in healthy young individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Mineralocorticoid Receptor Stimulation on Cognition
DOC.detailed_description: 80 healthy young individuals (40 females and 40 male) will be recruited an randomized to either placebo or 0.4 mg Fludrocortison before testing. Tasks will on emotion recognition, Task Switch, visual spacial memory and decision making will be conducted.
DOC.criteria: free of medication age 18 30 any medication severe illness
